docs.snippet: The president-elect made the unsubstantiated claim as part of a storm of Twitter posts voicing anger about a three-state recount push....
docs.lead_paragraph: The president-elect made the unsubstantiated claim as part of a storm of Twitter posts voicing anger about a three-state recount push.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump makes baseless claim that he would have won popular vote as well as Electoral College were it not for millions of illegal ballots; daylong flurry of Twitter posts by Trump follows announcement by Hillary Clinton's campaign that it will participate in recount effort; outburst also comes amid growing internal rift in transition team over consideration of Mitt Romney for secretary of state.

headline.main: Trump Claims, With No Evidence, That ‘Millions of People’ Voted Illegally
headline.print_headline: Trump Promotes a Baseless Claim on Illegal Voting

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear reported from Washington, and Maggie Haberman from New York.
byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and MAGGIE HABERMAN

docs.snippet: Mr. Bannon courted politicians who share his dark, populist worldview of a ruling class preying on working Americans and “the Judeo-Christian West” in a “war against Islamic fascism.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Bannon courted politicians who share his dark, populist worldview of a ruling class preying on working Americans and “the Judeo-Christian West” in a “war against Islamic fascism.”
docs.abstract: Profile of Stephen Bannon, controversial figure who Donald Trump has named as senior counselor and chief White House strategist; Bannon has found in Trump vessel for his worldview and populist goals for America, as well as parallel to strong admiration Bannon held for Pres Ronald Reagan in 1980s.

headline.main: Combative, Populist Steve Bannon Found His Man in Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: In Trump, Populist Provocateur Found the Man for His Mission

byline.contributor: Sharon LaFraniere, Jo Becker and Jacqueline Williams contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump claimed without evidence Sunday that "millions" voted illegally in the national election, scoffing at Hillary Clinton's nearly 2 million edge in the popular vote and returning to his campaign mantra of a rigged race ev...
docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump claimed without evidence Sunday that "millions" voted illegally in the national election, scoffing at Hillary Clinton's nearly 2 million edge in the popular vote and returning to his campaign mantra of a rigged race even as he prepares to enter the White House in less than two months.

headline.main: Trump Assails Recount Push, Claims Millions Voted Illegally
headline.print_headline: Trump Assails Recount Push, Claims Millions Voted Illegally

docs.snippet: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said in a tweet on Sunday that he won the popular vote in the Nov. 8 election "if you deduct the millions of people who voted illegally", though he provided no evidence of widespread voter fraud....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said in a tweet on Sunday that he won the popular vote in the Nov. 8 election "if you deduct the millions of people who voted illegally", though he provided no evidence of widespread voter fraud.

headline.main: Trump, Without Evidence, Says Illegal Voting Cost Him U.S. Popular Vote
headline.print_headline: Trump, Without Evidence, Says Illegal Voting Cost Him U.S. Popular Vote
